entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
